title: Source: Bengaluru-based B2B marketplace Udaan plans to lay off 325 to 350 employees, or 10%+ of its workforce, a week after raising $120M in convertible debt (Deepsekhar Choudhury/Moneycontrol)
description:
Deepsekhar Choudhury / Moneycontrol:
Source: Bengaluru-based B2B marketplace Udaan plans to lay off 325 to 350 employees, or 10%+ of its workforce, a week after raising $120M in convertible debt  —  Up to 350 on-payroll employees to get impacted, apart from a number of contractual workers  —  A week after securing $120 million …
